text: 7.22 Stt 17.9-13, Wkp 12.3 Nɨbi Mosis agak tek, ñɨ okok tɨkɨl mɨdɨl, wak tɨbɨlɨkɨpɨm agak. Pen nɨgɨm, gɨpɨm anɨb ak Mosis ne ned mel, nased yes sɨkop ned jɨj gɨl gel nɨm anɨgɨpɨm agak. Pen wak tɨbɨlɨkɨpɨm anɨb ak, ñɨn ogɨnap Juda añɨŋ lep ñɨn awl ak apek, ma kelɨgɨpɨm, monmon wak tɨbɨlɨkɨpɨm agak.
